alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lake of the Woods County through 415 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Graceton, or 44 miles east of Roseau, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baudette, Clementson, Graceton and Pitt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
